description: Generate or create content, code, text, or other information
Analyze, evaluate, assess or examine data, text, or content
Categorize, label, or classify information into predefined groups
Convert, translate, or transform data from one format to another
Condense, summarize, or create a brief version of content
Extract specific information, data, or insights from content
Find, search for, or locate specific information or content
Forecast, predict, or project future outcomes or trends
